author: dgraham
msg: ValidatorResources now uses a validating Digester to parse the validation
XML files.  If the files are not valid or well formed, a SAXException is thrown

author: dgraham
msg: Made <msg> attributes "name" and "key" required and removed
unneeded checking in Field.addMsg().  A <msg> element without name
and key is meaningless.  Also, fixed a copy-paste error in <arg>

author: dgraham
msg: Added bundle attribute to Arg and Msg to support alternate resource
